Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Black Lives Matter protesters did not block emergency crews from reaching Hurricane Harvey victims.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the actions of Black Lives Matter protesters by using the term "THUGS" and implying that they intentionally blocked emergency crews.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a satirical story and a photo from a different protest in a different location.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the actions of a few individuals in a protest represent the entire Black Lives Matter movement.
